hero.name: Rafael
hero.description: Web developer using PHP, ASP Classic and SQL Server. I turn ideas into efficient and scalable digital solutions.
about.title: About Me
about.text1: Developer experienced in building robust and scalable web solutions, specialized in backend technologies such as PHP and ASP Classic, with strong knowledge of SQL Server databases.
about.text2: My focus is delivering clean, efficient and well-documented code, always applying best development practices and the right technologies for each project.

process.subtitle: How I work to ensure project quality and efficiency
process.step1.title: Analysis & Planning
process.step1.desc: Full understanding of requirements, technical analysis and definition of the ideal architecture.
process.step2.title: Development
process.step2.desc: Implementation following best practices, clean code and focus on performance and maintainability.
process.step3.title: Testing & Quality
process.step3.desc: Rigorous testing, code review and quality assurance before each delivery.
process.step4.title: Delivery & Support
process.step4.desc: Controlled deployment, complete documentation and post-delivery support.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: By accessing and using this website, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any point, it is recommended not to use the site.
terms.section1.title: 1. Website Purpose
terms.section1.content: This website aims to present the professional portfolio, developed projects and allow contact for commercial and professional opportunities.
terms.section2.title: 2. Permitted Use
terms.section2.content: The user agrees to use this website lawfully, ethically and in compliance with applicable legislation.
terms.section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
terms.section3.content: All content on this website, including texts, images, source codes, layout and visual identity, is the property of Rafael Goulart, unless otherwise indicated.
terms.section3.content2: Reproduction, distribution or modification of any content without prior and express authorization is prohibited.
terms.section4.title: 4. Responsibilities
terms.section4.content: We do not guarantee that the website will be available uninterruptedly or error-free. Use of the information contained herein is the sole responsibility of the user.
terms.section5.title: 5. Third-Party Links
terms.section5.content: The website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, policies or practices of these websites.
terms.section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
terms.section6.content: Under no circumstances shall the website owner be liable for direct or indirect damages arising from the use or inability to use this website.
terms.section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
terms.section7.content: These Terms of Use may be modified at any time, and periodic consultation is recommended.
terms.section8.title: 8. Applicable Law
terms.section8.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how personal data is collected, used, stored and protected when accessing and using this website, in accordance with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13,709/2018 - LGPD).
privacy.section1.title: 1. Who We Are
privacy.section1.content: This website is maintained by Rafael Goulart, full stack developer, with the purpose of presenting a professional portfolio, completed projects and contact methods.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Data Collected
privacy.section2.intro: We may collect the following personal data:
privacy.list.item5: Technical data such as IP, browser and device (cookies)
privacy.section3.title: 3. Purpose of Data Use
privacy.section3.intro: The collected data is used exclusively for:
privacy.section3.list2: Responding to requests and commercial proposals
privacy.section3.list3: Improving user experience on the website
privacy.section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
privacy.section4.content: Personal data is not sold, rented or shared with third parties, except when required by law or with the express consent of the data subject.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Storage and Security
privacy.section5.content: We adopt appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, loss, alteration or improper disclosure.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Cookies
privacy.section6.content: This website may use cookies to improve navigation and performance. The user can disable cookies at any time in their browser.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Data Subject Rights
privacy.section7.intro: According to LGPD, you have the right to:
privacy.section8.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
privacy.section8.content: This policy may be updated at any time, and periodic review of this page is recommended.
privacy.section9.title: 9. Contact
privacy.section9.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us by email: rafaelgoulartferreira18@gmail.com
